name: LEGO GO GO
description:
Title: LEGO GO GO

Platform: PC 

GameGenre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market:  Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: 

This is a game based on LEGO models, with a total of two levels with different objectives. Players need to follow the requirements of each level to pass and complete the game.

Instructions: 

WASD for move   

Space for jumping

Game Design Team:

 Yuyue Chai– Game Designer
